jd: From: Anoop, Sspearhead Inc. anoop@sspearhead.com Reply to: anoop@sspearhead.com Job details :BA/QA- Day 1 onsiteAlbany, NYLong term Mandatory Qualification Business AnalystAnalyzes an organization or business domain (real or hypothetical) and documents its business or processes or systems, assessing the business model or its integration with technology with distinct deliverables to a solution. Expert84+ Months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field. Qualification Number Requested Qualifications:1. 84 months experience eliciting/extracting detailed business requirements from customer/project stakeholders or system artifacts and documenting such requirements. 2. 84 months experience developing and/or maintaining system artifacts and documentation including business requirements, user, and functional requirements, project process documentation, quality assurance and contingency operations plans and reports.3. 84 Months experience in obtaining and writing use cases, process models, workflows, creating screen mock-ups, report mock-ups and technical documents with attention to detail.4. 60 months QA experience including the following: Create Test Plans, Test Cases, and Test scripts, Execute functional and system tests including regression tests using manual and automated testing tools and record results using HP ALM/Quality Center (or equivalent), Identify and document application defects and track to resolution, performing retesting as required, Identify and document deficiencies in system documentation (e.g. missing or ambiguous requirements) identified during the testing process, Ensure appropriate test coverage by mapping system requirements to test cases5. 24 months experience validating requirements and executing test cases specific to web services. Experience should include using testing tools such as Postman, SoapUI or an equivalent Thanks,AnoopSspearhead Inc.www.Sspearhead.com
